QuestData.Title: Cut to the Bone
QuestData.Description:
I fear if our presence is known, so too is the presence of our comrades.
We must develop a contingency. With the foundry on such high alert, we cannot sneak about undetected.
Unless, of course, you were to provide a distraction. Perhaps thinning their numbers would suffice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate $1oa Ossein Workers and $2oa Violent Animates.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Regroup with Navigator Xennir at the rendezvous point.
QuestData.RewardText: He ought to be here... but he isn't.
